com.netflix.msl.keyx
Class AsymmetricWrappedExchange.JwkRsaCryptoContext

java.lang.Object
  com.netflix.msl.crypto.AsymmetricCryptoContext
      com.netflix.msl.keyx.AsymmetricWrappedExchange.JwkRsaCryptoContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICryptoContext
Enclosing class:
AsymmetricWrappedExchange
private static class AsymmetricWrappedExchange.JwkRsaCryptoContext
extends AsymmetricCryptoContext

A JWK RSA crypto context is unique in that it treats its wrap/unwrap operations as encrypt/decrypt respectively. This is for compatibility with the Web Crypto API.

Constructor Detail

AsymmetricWrappedExchange.JwkRsaCryptoContext

public AsymmetricWrappedExchange.JwkRsaCryptoContext(MslContext ctx,
                                                     String id,
                                                     PrivateKey privateKey,
                                                     PublicKey publicKey,
                                                     AsymmetricWrappedExchange.JwkRsaCryptoContext.Mode mode)

Create a new JWK RSA crypto context for the specified mode using the provided public and private keys. The mode identifies the operations to enable. All other operations are no-ops and return the data unmodified.

Parameters:
ctx - MSL context.
id - key pair identity.
privateKey - the private key. May be null.
publicKey - the public key. May be null.
mode - crypto context mode.
